import React from "react"; const InputForm = () => { return (

Come visit me

21 Park Ln Cir, North York, ON M3B 1Z8, Canada.

21,000 sqft Versailles-inspired estate in Toronto's exclusive Bridle Path neighborhood.

); }; export default InputForm;
